title: SUBMIT YOUR QUESTIONS!! June Q & A Request. A Personal Update. PLUS WE NOW HAVE 500 SUBSCRIBERS!!
description:
Time for more Questions for a June Q & A video. AND a personal update! Plus the channel just hit 500 subscribers. SUBMISSIONS ARE NOW CLOSED. 

And remember you can contribute to The Anadromist through PayPal here.
https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RG
